languages.text: "Касбаллика на Футфоле почти в открытую торгует ксеноартефактами. И Ордо Ксенос не торопится с этим разобраться..."
"The Kasballica trade xeno-artefacts on Footfall, and fairly blatantly at that. And the Ordo Xenos is in no hurry to rectify the situation..."
languages.original_text: "Касбаллика на Футфоле почти в открытую торгует ксеноартефактами. И Ордо Ксенос не торопится с этим разобраться..."

traits.locale_text: "The Kasballica trade xeno-artefacts on Footfall, and fairly blatantly at that. And the Ordo Xenos is in no hurry to rectify the situation..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “卡斯巴利卡在落脚港交易异形造物。他们的行为相当明目张胆，而异形审判庭并不急于纠正这样的现状……”
languages.original_text: "The Kasballica trade xeno-artefacts on Footfall, and fairly blatantly at that. And the Ordo Xenos is in no hurry to rectify the situation..."

traits.locale_text: “卡斯巴利卡在落脚港交易异形造物。他们的行为相当明目张胆，而异形审判庭并不急于纠正这样的现状……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Kasballica comercia con xenoartefactos en Paso, y con poca sutileza, además. Y el Ordo Xenos no tiene ninguna prisa por rectificar la situación...».
languages.original_text: "The Kasballica trade xeno-artefacts on Footfall, and fairly blatantly at that. And the Ordo Xenos is in no hurry to rectify the situation..."

traits.locale_text: «Kasballica comercia con xenoartefactos en Paso, y con poca sutileza, además. Y el Ordo Xenos no tiene ninguna prisa por rectificar la situación...».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「カスバリカはフットフォールで異種族のアーティファクトを取引している、それもかなりおおっぴらにな。そして〈純血の団〉は自体の収拾を図るつもりもない…」
languages.original_text: "The Kasballica trade xeno-artefacts on Footfall, and fairly blatantly at that. And the Ordo Xenos is in no hurry to rectify the situation..."

traits.locale_text: 「カスバリカはフットフォールで異種族のアーティファクトを取引している、それもかなりおおっぴらにな。そして〈純血の団〉は自体の収拾を図るつもりもない…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Die Kasballica handelt auf Footfall ziemlich offen mit Xenos-Artefakten. Und der Ordo Xenos hat keine Eile, die Situation zu bereinigen ..."
languages.original_text: "The Kasballica trade xeno-artefacts on Footfall, and fairly blatantly at that. And the Ordo Xenos is in no hurry to rectify the situation..."

traits.locale_text: "Die Kasballica handelt auf Footfall ziemlich offen mit Xenos-Artefakten. Und der Ordo Xenos hat keine Eile, die Situation zu bereinigen ..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « La Kasballica fait ouvertement commerce de xéno-artefacts sur Castel, mais l'Ordo Xénos ne semble pas être particulièrement pressé de rectifier la situation... »
languages.original_text: "The Kasballica trade xeno-artefacts on Footfall, and fairly blatantly at that. And the Ordo Xenos is in no hurry to rectify the situation..."

traits.locale_text: « La Kasballica fait ouvertement commerce de xéno-artefacts sur Castel, mais l'Ordo Xénos ne semble pas être particulièrement pressé de rectifier la situation... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Kasballica, Binliman'da zeno eserlerinin ticaretini yapıyor, üstelik göz göre göre. Zeno Nizamı ise duruma müdahale etmek konusunda pek de aceleci sayılmaz..."
languages.original_text: "The Kasballica trade xeno-artefacts on Footfall, and fairly blatantly at that. And the Ordo Xenos is in no hurry to rectify the situation..."

traits.locale_text: "Kasballica, Binliman'da zeno eserlerinin ticaretini yapıyor, üstelik göz göre göre. Zenolar Birliği ise duruma müdahale etmek konusunda pek de aceleci sayılmaz..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Kasballica trade xeno-artefacts on Footfall, and fairly blatantly at that. And the Ordo Xenos is in no hurry to rectify the situation..."
